title: Identify Failing Electrical Transformer
description: Sensors on a transformer show its temperature is steadily rising and its oil quality is degrading, indicating it is at high risk of failure.

tasks.description: Receive a 'Transformer Health Warning' alert based on predictive analytics.
Review the sensor data (temperature, oil quality, load) that triggered the alert.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the data indicates a high probability of imminent failure.

tasks.description: Create a high-priority work order to replace the transformer proactively before it fails and causes an outage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent schedules preventive maintenance to avoid an outage.
